name: Starbucks Classic Ceramic Mug
description: A timeless white ceramic mug featuring the iconic Starbucks Siren logo. Perfect for your morning brew at home or the office.

name: Starbucks Holiday Blend Mug
description: A festive red mug adorned with holiday designs and warm seasonal colors. A perfect gift for coffee lovers during the holiday season.

name: Starbucks City Collection Seattle Mug
description: Celebrate the birthplace of Starbucks with this Seattle skyline mug. Features iconic landmarks and the Pike Place Market Starbucks storefront.

name: Starbucks Reserve Dot Collection Mug
description: From the premium Starbucks Reserve collection, this elegant mug features a sophisticated dot pattern and a sleek matte black finish.

name: Starbucks Cold Cup Acrylic Tumbler
description: A clear acrylic tumbler perfect for iced beverages. Features a reusable straw and double-wall insulation to keep drinks cold longer.

name: Starbucks Seasonal Autumn Harvest Mug
description: Embrace the fall season with this warm-toned mug featuring pumpkin spice motifs and rich autumn leaves. A cozy companion for your pumpkin spice latte.
